# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : credit_clear.py

from rest_framework import serializers
import datetime

from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate, CreditClearDetail, CreditClear
from consts.common import DATE_FORMAT
from utils.drf.fields import FenToYuanFloatField
from utils.fen_and_yuan import fen_to_yuan
from utils.number_2_chinese import cncurrency



[文档]class CreditCertificateClearSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    clear_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    clear_amount_big = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    from_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="credit.credit_number")
    credit_deadline = serializers.CharField(source="credit.end")
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    punishment_rate = serializers.DecimalField(source="credit.punishment_rate", decimal_places=2, max_digits=10)
    clear_out_days = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    # penalty_interest_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    pay_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    pay_enclosure = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_clear_amount(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        获取清分金额
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        amount = instance.amount + instance.penalty_interest
        return fen_to_yuan(amount)



[文档]    def get_clear_amount_big(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        清分金额大写
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        amount = instance.amount + instance.penalty_interest
        return cncurrency(fen_to_yuan(amount))



[文档]    def get_clear_out_days(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        获取清分逾期天数
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        now = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        overdue_days = (now - instance.promise_pay_at).days
        if overdue_days <= 0:
            return 0
        return overdue_days


    # def get_penalty_interest_amount(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
    #     """
    #     罚息金额
    #     @param instance:
    #     @return:
    #     """
    #     return fen_to_yuan(instance.penalty_interest)


[文档]    def get_pay_at(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        清分支付时间
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        if hasattr(instance, "creditclear"):
            if instance.creditclear.pay_at:
                return instance.creditclear.pay_at.strftime(DATE_FORMAT)
        return ""



[文档]    def get_pay_enclosure(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        支付附件
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        if hasattr(instance, "creditclear"):
            return instance.creditclear.pay_enclosure if instance.creditclear.pay_enclosure else ""
        return ""



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "id", "clear_amount", "number", "clear_amount_big", "from_company", "capital_company",
            "credit_number", "credit_deadline", "promise_pay_at", "amount", "punishment_rate",
            "pay_at", "pay_enclosure", "clear_out_days"
        ]




[文档]class CreditClearExecuteSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """ 清分支付 """

[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditClear
        fields = ['is_clear', 'pay_enclosure', 'pay_at', 'pay_amount', 'amount_payable', 's1_user_id']




[文档]class CreditClearUndoSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """ 清分管理-未清分 序列化器"""
    number = serializers.CharField(label="X信编号", source="credit_certificate.number")
    id = serializers.IntegerField(label="X信id", source="credit_certificate_id")
    amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label='X信金额')
    promise_pay_at = serializers.DateField(label="承诺付款日", source="credit_certificate.promise_pay_at")
    pay_rest_day = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="清分剩余天数")
    clear_out_day = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="清分逾期天数")
    amount_payable = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="应付金额")
    payable = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="是否可支付")


[文档]    def get_amount(self, val):
        return round(val.credit_certificate.amount / 100, 2)



[文档]    def get_pay_rest_day(self, val):
        rest_days = val.credit_certificate.promise_pay_at - datetime.datetime.now().date()
        if rest_days.days > 0:
            return rest_days.days
        return 0



[文档]    def get_clear_out_day(self, val):
        out_days = datetime.datetime.now().date() - val.credit_certificate.promise_pay_at
        if out_days.days > 0:
            return out_days.days
        return 0



[文档]    def get_amount_payable(self, val):
        value = sum((e.entry_principal-e.out_principal) for e in val.credit_certificate.get_preorder_traversal)
        return round(value/100, 2)



[文档]    def get_payable(self, val):
        rest_days = val.credit_certificate.promise_pay_at - datetime.datetime.now().date()
        if 0 < rest_days.days <= 3 or self.get_clear_out_day(val) > 0:
            return True
        return False



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditClear
        fields = ['id', 'number', 'amount', 'promise_pay_at', 'pay_rest_day',
                  'clear_out_day', 'amount_payable', 'payable']




[文档]class CreditClearDoneSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """ 清分管理-已清分 序列化器"""
    number = serializers.CharField(label="X信编号", source="credit_certificate.number")
    id = serializers.IntegerField(label="X信id", source="credit_certificate_id")
    amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label='X信金额')
    promise_pay_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="承诺付款日")
    amount_payable = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="应付金额")
    pay_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="支付金额")
    pay_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="支付日期")


[文档]    def get_amount(self, val):
        return round(val.credit_certificate.amount / 100, 2)



[文档]    def get_amount_payable(self, val):
        return round(val.amount_payable / 100, 2)



[文档]    def get_pay_amount(self, val):
        return round(val.pay_amount / 100, 2)



[文档]    def get_promise_pay_at(self, val):
        return val.credit_certificate.promise_pay_at



[文档]    def get_pay_at(self, val):
        return val.pay_at.date()



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditClear
        fields = ['id', 'number', 'amount', 'promise_pay_at', 'amount_payable',
                  'pay_amount', 'pay_at']




[文档]class CreditCertificateClearListStoreSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """ 专门用于存储清分列表数据 """
    credit_certificate = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    company_name = serializers.CharField(source="company.name")
    credit_code = serializers.CharField(source="company.credit_code")
    total_amount = serializers.IntegerField(source="amount")
    balance = serializers.SerializerMethodField(label="余额")
    transfer_amount = serializers.IntegerField(source="has_transfer")
    financing_amount = serializers.IntegerField(source="has_financing")
    clear_principal = serializers.IntegerField(source="amount")
    penalty_interest_amount = serializers.IntegerField(source="penalty_interest")
    entry_principal = serializers.IntegerField()
    out_principal = serializers.IntegerField()
    level = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    net_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_net_amount(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        净额
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        return instance.entry_principal - instance.out_principal



[文档]    def get_level(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        层级数 前端用来控制空格数量
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        if instance.path:
            return len(instance.path)
        return 0



[文档]    def get_balance(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        返回余额
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        return instance.balance



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "id", "credit_certificate", "company_name", "credit_code", "total_amount",
            "balance", "transfer_amount", "financing_amount", "clear_principal",
            "penalty_interest_amount", "entry_principal", "out_principal", "level",
            "net_amount"
        ]




[文档]class CreditCertificateClearListSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    credit_certificate = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    company_name = serializers.CharField(source="company.name")
    credit_code = serializers.CharField(source="company.credit_code")
    total_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="amount")
    balance = FenToYuanFloatField()
    transfer_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="has_transfer")
    financing_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="has_financing")
    clear_principal = FenToYuanFloatField(source="amount")
    penalty_interest_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="penalty_interest")
    entry_principal = FenToYuanFloatField()
    out_principal = FenToYuanFloatField()
    level = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    net_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_net_amount(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        净额
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        return fen_to_yuan(instance.entry_principal - instance.out_principal)



[文档]    def get_level(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        层级数 前端用来控制空格数量
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        if instance.path:
            return len(instance.path)
        return 0



[文档]    def get_balance(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        返回余额
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        return fen_to_yuan(instance.balance)

[文档]class CreditCertificateClearDetailListSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    id = serializers.IntegerField(source="credit_certificate.id")
    credit_certificate = serializers.CharField(source="credit_certificate.number")
    total_amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    balance = FenToYuanFloatField()
    transfer_amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    financing_amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    clear_principal = FenToYuanFloatField()
    penalty_interest_amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    entry_principal = FenToYuanFloatField()
    out_principal = FenToYuanFloatField()
    net_amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    level = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_level(self, instance: CreditClearDetail):
        """
        层级数 前端用来控制空格数量
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        if instance.credit_certificate.path:
            return len(instance.credit_certificate.path)
        return 0



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditClearDetail
        fields = [
            "id", "company_name", "credit_code", "credit_certificate",
            "total_amount", "transfer_amount", "financing_amount", "clear_principal",
            "penalty_interest_amount", "entry_principal", "out_principal", "net_amount",
            "level", "balance"
